thread.title: 'I'm just having a wazz' Heather Graham is unveiled as Foxy Bingo in hilarious new advert
thread.title_full: 'I'm just having a wazz' Heather Graham is unveiled as Foxy Bingo in hilarious new advert

author: Hayley Minn
title: 'I'm just having a wazz' Heather Graham is unveiled as Foxy Bingo in hilarious new advert
text:
'I'm just having a wazz' Heather Graham is unveiled as Foxy Bingo in hilarious new advert EXC: Mirror TV takes a first look at the Hollywood star behind Foxy Bingo Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now EXCLUSIVE: First look at Heather Graham in new Foxy Bingo ad Share this video Get soaps   Thank you for subscribing! Could   
Mirror TV has an exclusive first-look at the shock Hollywood star who has just been unveiled as the real Foxy Bingo . 
For years now people have wondered just who the Northern man is behind the Foxy Bingo costume, and Emmerdale viewers tonight will finally get the answer. 
Except it's not a Northern man at all - but actually actress Heather Graham . 
The Hangover star is going to shock viewers of the ITV soap as she slips into the famous purple Paul Smith suit for a tongue-in-cheek advert to air during tonight's show. We've never known who Foxy Bingo is until now (Photo: FOXYBINGO) He's finally taken off his mask (Photo: FOXYBINGO) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Heather Graham stars as Foxy Bingo ad executive in new ad Share this video Watch Next 
Then on Saturday, a second advert featuring Heather will air - and Mirror TV has the exclusive first look. 
In the hilarious clip, a show runner knocks on Foxy AKA Heather's dressing room door. 
'Playing Foxy, she then shouts shes "just having a wazz" in an incredible Northern male accent. And it's Heather Graham! (Photo: FOXYBINGO) We were NOT expecting that! (Photo: FOXYBINGO) Heather's thrilled to be part of the campaign (Photo: GETTY) Read More Emmerdale's 'prison homophobia' storyline triggers 180 complaints to TV watchdog 
Speaking about the campaign, Heather Graham said: "I love comedy and I love British wit. 
"When they told me I would get to play Foxy, I loved the idea and thought it was hilarious. 
"I especially loved wearing the tail. I wish I could have kept the tail! 
"I've never gotten to play a man or a fox so it was a big challenge." 
*The Foxy Bingo advert debuts on ITV1 tonight at 8.15pm Like us on Facebook
